Name: Agility
Description: A measure of how skilfully you can move.

Name: Brawn
Description: A measure of how strong you are.

Name: Charisma
Description: A measure of how well you interact with other people

Name: Divinity
Description: A measure of your connection with the spirit world.

Name: Intellect
Description: A measure of your mental prowess and knowledge.

Name: Pathfinding
Description: A measure of your ability to traverse the world.

Name: Quickness
Description: A measure of how fast you can move.

Name: Resilience
Description: A measure of how tough you are.

Name: Survivalism
Description: A measure of how well you can adapt to your surroundings.

Name: Vitality
Description: A measure of how healthy you are.

Name: Willpower
Description: A measure of how disciplined you are.
